title: Project-Based Course for Enhancing Multicultural Communication Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Environment where current practitioners collaborate with multicultural learner groups on projects within language education contexts

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three language strategies for effective communication in multicultural environments
Learners can develop and execute team project plans reflecting cultural differences
Learners can utilize at least two feedback techniques that respect peer learners’ cultural backgrounds
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
